gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 153, Jazz 124
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans set a franchise record for points in a game for a 153-124 win over the Jazz. CJ McCollum led the way with 33 points and nine 3PM, while Herbert Jones (22 points, five rebounds, five assists) and Zion Williamson (17 points, career-high 11 assists) combined for 39 in the victory. Collin Sexton tallied 22 points and seven assists for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 26-18 on the season, while the Jazz fall to 22-23.
